p: The concrete values of hydrophobicity and hydrophilicity are given in Table A1. In this study, the five aforementioned features of peptide sequences were generated by using the protr package in the R programming environment [ 90]. The parameters of PseAAC (weight 1 and lamda 1) and Am-PseAAC (weight 2 and lamda 2) were optimized by varying weight and lambda values from 0 to 1 and 1 to 10 with step sizes of 0.1 and 1, respectively, on the whole T 544p+407n and T 544p+544n datasets as assessed by a 5-fold CV procedure. More details of how to estimate such parameters can be found elsewhere [ 15, 73, 74, 75].
